articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ju Chang Jun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ju Chang Jun
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Friday sent a wreath to the bier of Ju Chang Jun, recipient of Order of Kim Il Sung and the National Reunification Prize and former DPRK ambassador to China, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: North-South Joint Committee of Kaesong Industrial Zone Meets
articles.content:
North-South Joint Committee of Kaesong Industrial Zone Meets
 Kaesong, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Sixth Meeting of the North-South Joint Committee of the Kaesong Industrial Zone took place on Friday on the spot.
					 The meeting discussed practical issues arising in operating the zone.

articles.title: 4th National Conference of Veterans to Be Held
articles.content:
4th National Conference of Veterans to Be Held
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The 4th National Conference of Veterans will be held here on the occasion of the war victory day this year marking the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The conference will bring together anti-Japanese war veterans and war veterans who displayed matchless heroism and self-sacrificing spirit in the great Fatherland Liberation War, merited people in wartime, former unconverted long-term prisoners and veterans who performed feats in the showdown with the U.S. and the struggle for protecting socialism in the post-war period. 
					
					 Preparatory work is being stepped up under the care of the party and state.

articles.title: European Politicians Leave
articles.content:
European Politicians Leave
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe headed by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair, left here Friday.

articles.title: Korean Wrestlers Back Home
articles.content:
Korean Wrestlers Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Wrestlers of the DPRK came back home Thursday after proving successful at the 2015 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship. 
					 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned and their families.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Opens
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Opens
 Sariwon, July 17 (KCNA) -- The National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup opened with due ceremony in Sariwon City Friday to mark the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The tournament brought together ace players of the National Taekwon-Do Team and other Taekwon-Do teams, Korea University of Physical Education and Central Physical Training College. Its participants will compete in Taekwon-Do and Paduk (go) matches.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Pak Thae Dok, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Im Hun, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, sportspersons, youth and students.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony there took place demonstrations by players of various provincial Taekwon-do teams.

articles.title: DPRK Fishermen Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Inhumanity
articles.content:
DPRK Fishermen Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Inhumanity
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group's detention of DPRK fishermen, who were adrift in the East Sea of Korea, is incurring the wrath of the people in the DPRK.
					 All the fishermen in the DPRK have criticized the detention as a flagrant violation of DPRK citizens' rights as well as a grave provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 Jong Ju Hyok, a fisherman of the Chongjin Fishery Station, told KCNA:
					
					 It is a universal international usage to rescue people in distress in the sea and send them to their home.
					
					 The DPRK side has rescued and helped the south Korean fishermen, who drifted in its territorial or surrounding waters, in view of compatriotism.
					
					 We, fishermen, will never tolerate such inhumane and gangster-like acts committed by the south Korean puppet group as the detention of our fellows.
					
					 Kim In Guk, a fisherman of the Soho Fishery Station, said:
					
					 I can hardly repress my indignation at the south Korean puppet group's inhumane act. The group detained the DPRK fishermen in a bid to use them for smear campaign against the DPRK. It is a height of crudity.
					
					 We will surely make the group pay dear price for it.
					
					 Ryu Jin Il, a fisherman of the Sinpho Fishery Station, said:
					
					 We are wrapped in the retaliatory will to mercilessly punish the puppet group running amuck in the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The group should immediately repatriate the detained fishermen to their families and make an apology for its inhumane act and punish those responsible for it.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Detaining Crewmen of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Detaining Crewmen of DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea Friday made public a statement denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for refusing to send back residents of the DPRK. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is forcibly detaining three residents of the DPRK under the absurd pretext that they "defected to the south" to separate them from their families. This is the base and vicious human rights abuse and another provocative act of escalating confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 A saying goes every sin brings its punishment with it. 
					
					 These days the Park Geun Hye group is vociferating about deceptive "dialogue" in a crafty bid to get out of the quagmire. But it can never cover up its ill-intentioned purpose to abuse the humanitarian issue for escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The despicable conspiratorial racket kicked up by the group, keeping the crewmen in custody, would only touch off bitterer ridicule and criticism of the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The group should pay heed to the protest and denunciation of the people in the north and all other compatriots, send the crewmen back without delay and halt at once its futile racket.

articles.title: DPRK Students Prove Successful at International Math Olympiad
articles.content:
DPRK Students Prove Successful at International Math Olympiad
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK students came back home on Friday after proving successful at the 56th International Math Olympiad held in Thailand from July 4 to 16
					 The Olympiad brought together at least 570 students from more than 100 countries and regions.
					
					 The participants competed in solving problems in theory of numbers, arithmetic, geometry and combinatorial mathematics.
					
					 Ri Myong Hyok, Jon Kum Song and Ri Il Myong of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 bagged gold medals by successfully solving the problems requiring the highest degree of concentration and thinking faculty.
					
					 Three other students Kang Song Hyok, Choe Song Yong and Ri Jong Yol received silver medals.

articles.title: Zeal for Production and Construction Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Zeal for Production and Construction Goes Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The people's zeal for production and construction has run higher in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with the approach of the election of deputies to provincial (municipal), city (district) and county people's assemblies (July 19).
					 They are now replete with the strong will to display to the full the stamina of Songun (military-first) Korea vigorously advancing under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The workers of Sangwon and Sunchon cement complexes have increased the production of cement to greet the elections with labor feats.
					
					 Rapid progress was also made in various big projects of the country such as construction of power stations in Paekam, stock-breeding base in Sepho area, waterways in South Hwanghae Province and Mirae Scientists Street and Sci-Tech Complex in Pyongyang.
					
					 Signal successes are reported one after another from various industrial sectors and agricultural field.
					
					 All the people turned out in a drive to bring about an upswing in production and construction with the will to demonstrate the invincibility and might of the DPRK government.

articles.title: Full Demonstration of Spirit of Prospering Great Paektusan Nation under Leadership of Kim Jong Un Called for
articles.content:
Full Demonstration of Spirit of Prospering Great Paektusan Nation under Leadership of Kim Jong Un Called for
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an editorial to the third anniversary of the conferment of the title of Marshal of the DPRK upon supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The conferment of the title of Marshal of the DPRK upon him on July 17, Juche 101 (2012) was an expression of undisputed trust and loyalty of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to him and a historic event that recorded a milestone of epochal turn in ushering in a new heyday of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea. 
					
					 It was the great auspicious event and big fortune in the national history spanning five thousand years to confer the title of Marshal of the DPRK upon him. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are convinced through the three years' experience of life that there are the bright future and the final victory of the great Paektusan nation when they remain true to his leadership.
					
					 He has made utmost efforts to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages as the sun of Juche over the past three years.
					
					 The DPRK could perform such political and military miracles as winning one victory after another in the anti-imperialist confrontation decisive of the destiny of the country and the nation over the past three years thanks to his energetic Songun leadership.
					
					 Indeed, the past three years represented a proud history in which a great victory was won and epoch-making changes took place in defending socialism and building a thriving nation under his guidance and his absolute prestige and fame as a great political master in the present era were strikingly demonstrated.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all service personnel and people to fully display the spirit of the prospering great Paektusan nation, loudly singing a march for the final victory under his leadership.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Snubs S. Korean Authorities' Loud-mouthed "Dialogue"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Snubs S. Korean Authorities' Loud-mouthed "Dialogue"
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are talking volumes about "two-way strategy for dialogue and pressure",  putting the inter-Korean relations into a more uncontrollable catastrophe.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 They are more noisily trumpeting about "dialogue" on one hand and more frantically kicking up the "human rights" racket and sanctions row against the DPRK and staging war exercises targeting it in collusion with outsiders on the other hand.
					
					 This is a typical example of double-dealing tactics.
					
					 The above-said "strategy" is not aimed at dialogue.
					
					 They have never considered the DPRK as a dialogue partner but worked hard to slander and do harm to it.
					
					 In fact, in the whole course of pursuing "the north Korea policy" they only increased the military pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 In the final analysis, their double-dealing tactics are nothing but a cynical ploy to paint their racket for stifling the DPRK kicked up in collusion with outside forces as the one for "dialogue" and further ratchet it up. 
					
					 Dialogue and confrontation can never go together. Their invariable anti-DPRK confrontation racket keeps the door of inter-Korean dialogue closed tightly.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Illegally Detaining DPRK Crewmen
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Illegally Detaining DPRK Crewmen
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary accuses the south Korean puppet regime of illegally detaining three of the five crewmen of the DPRK, talking about "their will to defect."
					 This is an unpardonable crime against humanity as it seriously infringes upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and rights of its citizens and tramples down even humanitarianism, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Far from mitigating the pain of the fellow countrymen resulting from the national division caused by foreign forces, the puppet regime forced those citizens to eternally part from their harmonious families. This is a barbarous act against human ethics.
					
					 The regime talks about "will to defect" and "international practice" in a bid to cover up its crimes against humanity but it only brings into bolder relief its true colors as a group of heinous tricksters and confrontation maniacs.
					
					 Its forcible detention of the citizens of the DPRK is part of the conspiratorial racket being kicked up ever more desperately by the puppet regime against the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind it is a sinister design of the puppet regime to malignantly hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK by taking issue with its "human rights performance."
					
					 Statute of limitations is not applicable to such crime against humanity.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the puppet regime's crimes against the nation and humanity but force it to pay dearly for them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. "Report on Human Rights" Political Chicanery
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. "Report on Human Rights" Political Chicanery
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of State's "Country Reports on Human Rights Practices for 2014" is being cursed and rejected by the international community.
					 A spokesman for the Russian Foreign Ministry said the U.S. "report on human rights" fully reflects the U.S.-style attitude liking to admonish others at all times as it is a document peppered with political colors.
					
					 Iran, Egypt, Algeria and many other countries ridicule the U.S., asserting that the "report" does not deserve even a passing note and the U.S. had better pay heed to its human rights performance.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says the U.S. "report on human rights" is a document of political swindles and falsities to internationally isolate and pressurize the sovereign states, those countries courting its displeasure, in particular.
					
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					 The "human rights" racket kicked off by the U.S. is aimed to make the DPRK and other anti-U.S. independent countries yield to the former under the pretext of "human rights" by building up public opinion abroad in a bid to carry out the ambition for world domination.
					
					 It is a trite method of the U.S. to hype the "human rights issue" of other countries to the maximum and bring down them by open armed intervention in the long run to establish American-style "democracy" there.
					
					 It is just the U.S. which should improve its human rights performance.
					
					 The U.S. should know that it is not a human rights judge but the worst human rights abuser in the world.

articles.title: South Korean IS's Purchase of Hacking Program under Fire
articles.content:
South Korean IS's Purchase of Hacking Program under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Intelligence Service (IS) was disclosed to have purchased a program monitoring computers and smart phones from a European hacking enterprise.
					 Among the purchasers of the hacking program from the enterprise was south Korean puppet army unit 5163, an anonymous name the IS has used for foreign trade.
					
					 IS, going by that name, had a deal with the enterprise through a private business and paid 273,000 euros for RCS program on Jan. 5, 2012.
					
					 In addition, IS has so far spent 390 million won for the management and maintenance of the RCS in five installments.
					
					 IS has never denied this fact, but let loose sophism that this was for a research purpose to cope with the hacking attack from the north.

articles.title: Thorough Investigation into Anthrax Case Demanded in South Korea
articles.content:
Thorough Investigation into Anthrax Case Demanded in South Korea
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other south Korean public organizations staged an action for independence, peace and reunification in Seoul on July 14.
					 The participants referred to the recent disclosure of the fact that the U.S. conducted anthrax experiments in south Korea and other countries.
					
					 The present south Korean chief executive failed to utter even a word in protest against the U.S. even though it was disclosed that the U.S. troops in south Korea secretly conducted experiments on botulinus which is one hundred thousand times more poisonous than anthrax, they deplored, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean regime reportedly formed a joint working group to look into the anthrax case but it was not enough for thorough investigation and prevention of its recurrence.
					
					 They underscored the need to form a fact-finding group comprising civic and public organizations in order to probe the truth about the case.

articles.title: South Korean Public Organizations Condemn IS's Eavesdropping
articles.content:
South Korean Public Organizations Condemn IS's Eavesdropping
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society, the Progressive Network Center, the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society, the Catholic Human Rights Committee and the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea held a press conference before the building of the "National Assembly" on July 14 in protest against the puppet Intelligence Service's eavesdropping.
					 The IS was deluged with criticism for purchasing a hacking system from abroad to eavesdrop on the people, the organizations held, and went on:
					
					 The IS insisted that the eavesdropping equipment was aimed "to cope with hacking attack from the north", but recent cyber attacks on several institutions proved that it was no more than a subterfuge to mislead the public opinion.
					
					 The "president" can never evade the responsibility for ordering the eavesdropping.

articles.title: Japanese Organization Demands Normalization of Ties between Japan and DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Organization Demands Normalization of Ties between Japan and DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Liaison Council for Demanding Denuclearization and Peace in Northeast Asia and Normalization of Relations between Japan and the DPRK held a general meeting in Tokyo on July 6. 
					 Associate Professor of Rikkyo University Koichi Ishizaka, co-representative and secretary general of the liaison council, made a report at the meeting. 
					
					 The Japan-DPRK relations, which had seemed to improve for a while after inter-governmental talks held in Stockholm, Sweden in May last year, were driven into the worst phase after the Japanese police authorities' violence against the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, the reporter said.
					
					 Instable situation has been created in Northeast Asia owing to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, he added.
					
					 He denounced the Japanese authorities for pushing ahead with the security bill and referred to the significance of normalizing the ties between Japan and the DPRK.
					
					 He raised it as this year's task of the liaison council to realize the normalization of the ties and urge the Japanese government to make sincere apology and reparation for the past crimes and oppose human rights abuses against Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Haruki Wata, honorary professor at University of Tokyo who is advisor to the liaison council, and other personages gave lectures for earlier normalization of the Japan-DPRK relations. 
					
					 The meeting adopted an appeal demanding the Japanese government make positive efforts for early normalization of the relations with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Holding the Great Comrade Kim Il Sung in High Esteem Is the Noblest Moral Obligation of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on July 7.
					 The work was published on Oct. 27, Juche 88 (1999).

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Mexico, Venezuela, DR Congo and Congo on July 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico said that Kim Il Sung is the eternal President of the DPRK who led the two revolutionary wars against the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and socialist construction to victories and thus built a socialist power of Juche.
					
					 The chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the President made great contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of human independence, pursued the politics of love for the people and positively helped the progressives in their struggle for independence.
					
					 He stressed that a lot of people in the world are boundlessly revering the President irrespective of differing political views and religious beliefs.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee of DR Congo for the Study of the Juche Idea lauded the President for founding the Juche idea and Songun idea, instilling faith in victory into the progressives and ushering in the new era of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples praised the President for performing feats for the country's prosperity and the sacred cause of global independence, saying that the progressives sincerely wish him immortality.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Angola, Syria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed in Angola, Syria
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Personages of Angola and Syria released statements on July 7 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Amalia Alexandr, international secretary of the women's organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, said:
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea and led the Korean people's struggle to apply it, thus making distinguished contributions to carrying out the cause of human independence and the socialist cause.
					
					 Regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven all his life, the President not only dedicated himself to the people in the whole course of leading the Korean revolution but also rendered material and moral assistance to many countries including African countries in their struggle for national liberation and building of new society
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria, said:
					
					 The President is the sun of Juche who left revolutionary legacies and performed exploits to be always remembered by the Korean people, world revolutionaries and progressives forever.
					
					 The President was an invincible and iron-willed commander who, upon embarking on the road of revolution in his teens, defeated the Japanese imperialists and won back the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation and brought about a fundamental turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people and progressives.
					
					 He will always be remembered by the Korean people and world progressives.

articles.title: Korean Films Shown in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Korean Films Shown in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Indonesia, Thailand and Nigeria from July 6 to 8 in commemoration of the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Films shown included Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Arms of Korea". 
					
					 The general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said the President was the greatest man praised by all people and father of socialist Korea who dedicated himself to prosperity of the country and happiness of its people. 
					
					 The Pioneer Party of Indonesia will as ever fully support the Korean people in their just struggle for implementing the behests of the President, the general chairman added.
					
					 The director of the World Cereals Company of Thailand said the film show offered him an opportunity to know better about the greatness of the President and the history of the Korean revolution, history of Songun which had advanced under his wise leadership. 
					
					 The director for Science and Technology of the Ministry of Education of Yobe State, Nigeria and other speakers said the world lauds the President as the sun as he clearly indicated the way for mankind to follow, provided a flower garden of human love and took care of all people with great magnanimity.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed with due ceremony on July 10 by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany. 
					 The chairman of the forum was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold a film show, reading session, seminar, remembrance meeting and other colorful political and cultural events from July 10 to October 10.

articles.title: Korea's Reunification Supported by Egyptian Personage, Brazilian Body
articles.content:
Korea's Reunification Supported by Egyptian Personage, Brazilian Body
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, made public a statement on July 9 to observe the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Korean nation has been divided by the U.S. imperialists for 70 years.
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea and the south Korean authorities should not follow outsiders but take the stand of By Our Nation Itself for Korea's reunification. 
					
					 Reunification of Korea is directly related to world peace and security. 
					
					 The U.S. should pull its forces out of south Korea as early as possible. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a Brazilian body sent a solidarity message to the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea in support of the Korean people's just cause on July 1.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ju Chang Jun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ju Chang Jun
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 17 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ju Chang Jun, condecorado con la Orden Kim Il Sung y el Premio Reunificacion de la Patria y ex embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acreditado en China, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Sesionada 6a reunion de comite conjunto N-S de ZIK
articles.content:
Sesionada 6a reunion de comite conjunto N-S de ZIK
Kaesong, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el terreno la sexta reunion del comite conjunto Norte-Sur de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK).
					En la ocasion fueron consultados los problemas practicos que se presentan en la gestion de ZIK.

articles.title: Tendra lugar en Pyongyang IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos de Guerra
articles.content:
Tendra lugar en Pyongyang IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos de Guerra
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de victoria de este ano en la Guerra de Liberacion de Patria del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea y de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, tendra lugar en esta capital la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos de Guerra. 
					Asistiran ahi los ex combatientes antijaponeses, los veteranos de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, los ameritados en la guerra, los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados y los veteranos que realizaron meritos en la confrontacion antiyanqui y la defensa de socialismo en el tiempo posbelico. 
					
					Ahora se promueven con teson los preparativos del conclave en medio de la gran atencion del partido y el Estado.

articles.title: Denunciado en RPDC crimen antietico de banda titere surcoreana
articles.content:
Denunciado en RPDC crimen antietico de banda titere surcoreana
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea hizo publica el dia 17 una declaracion de condena al crimen antietico de la banda de Park Geun-hye que so pretexto de "sumision", detuvo a 3 habitantes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y no los devuelve todavia.
					El hecho es la violacion vil y atroz de los derechos humanos y otra provocacion que agrava la confrontacion intercoreana, subraya la nota y continua:
					
					Cada cual responde por sus actos.
					
					Ahora, la horda de Park actua astutamente para salir del aprieto, hablando tanto del "dialogo" enganoso, pero nunca podra ocultar su intencion maligna de abusar hasta del  problema humanitario en la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Cuando mas recurra a la artimana infame con detener a nuestros habitantes, la banda de Park Geun-hye sera burlada y  condenada mas por el exterior y el interior. 
					
					La banda titere surcoreana debe devolver sin demora a nuestros habitantes detenidos forzosamente y acabar ahora mismo con la estupida campana intrigante anti-RPDC, prestando oido a la protesta y condenacion de nuestro pueblo y todos los connacionales.
